content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code

-- Guide
-- https://github.com/solliancenet/azure-synapse-analytics-day/blob/master/01-explore-data-lake.md
SELECT
    COUNT (*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedaydatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi/factsale-parquet/2012/Q1/*/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
